name: Stargoose
description: Star Goose (also known as "Stargoose Warrior") is a shoot 'em up video game for Amiga, Atari ST and DOS computer systems, published by Logotron in 1988. The music for Star Goose was composed by Fred Gray. In 1991, the Amiga and ST versions were re-issued in the UK on Prism Leisure's "16-Bit Pocket Power" imprint.
